definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: The utility model can effectively avoid foreign odor and harmful gas emitted by the contamination of the drain.
sentences.chinese: 能有效避免排污管被污染而散發異味和有害氣體。

sentences.english: Under Nanjing Yangtze River sewage pipes' anti-corrosion engineering.
sentences.chinese: 南京長江底下排污管道的防腐工程。

sentences.english: The workmen excavated a hole in the wall to let the sewage pipe pass through.
sentences.chinese: 工人們在牆上掘了個洞讓排污管道通過。

sentences.english: Study on bimetallic corrosion testing of blow-off pipe of compressor outlet.
sentences.chinese: 壓縮機出口排污管的電偶腐蝕實驗研究。

sentences.english: The dirty water falls out through a pipe along way out to sea.
sentences.chinese: 下水道和排污管的設計受到若干因素的影響。

sentences.english: The design of a drain or sewer is influenced by a number of factors.
sentences.chinese: 下水道和排污管的設計受到若干因素的影響。

definition: drain/underground drainpipe/floor gutter/25th of 2nd lunar month
